item.description:
Just to make sure everyone got it right, our show is this Saturday, September 27th and not October 27th.

Hope to see you all there!!!

Rock on!

Jason



Hello folks-

Come see some of your fellow Incubator's including Jason, Sandy, Robin and me perform with the improv troupe Lost Marbles. It will feature an awesome exhibition of short-form, mid-form, and musical improvisation!

Saturday, September 27 from 7pm to 8:30pm
@ Spiegel Auditorium, Cambridge Center for Adult Education, 56 Brattle Street, Cambridge
In Harvard Square

Tickets are $5 at the door and refreshments will be available.
All Lost Marbles, all evening. Don't miss this hilarious exhibition of Boston-area improv talent!
If you have any questions, just drop me an email!

Invite your friends to come and dare your enemies to show...

Lisa
item.name: Lost Marbles presents Lost in Marbleland
